DOC.brief_summary: This study demonstrate definitive bioequivalence solid dose formulation MK0974 liquid fill capsule formulation MK0974 .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Tablet Liquid-Filled Capsule Forms MK0974 ( 0974-042 )
DOC.criteria: Subject good health Subject nonsmoker Subject willing comply study restriction Subject history stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder Subject history cancer Subject nursing mother Subject uncontrolled high blood pressure Subject history disease condition might make participation study unsafe confound study result
